item.title: The Benefits of Using Straw as a Mushroom Substrate
item.description: Explore the holistic advantages of using straw as a substrate for mushroom cultivation, blending modern science with shamanic insights to reveal the secrets of this ancient practice.
item.author: (Psychedelic Bible)

item.title: The Frugal Farmers Mycelium Syringe Tek: Affordable Inoculation for the Masses
item.description: Explore the alchemical blend of ancient wisdom and modern science in creating affordable mycelium syringes. From spores to harvest, this guide provides a metaphysical and practical approach to growing your own psychedelic mushrooms.
item.author: (Psychedelic Bible)
